a great pc remaster of a fantastic game for those that havent played it this game plays like a long lost episode of the ghostbusters show or a ghostbusters 15 the movie which means its right in the middle of the ghostbusters on their jobs with interactions from all the classic characters from the films  as far as the remaster it runs great minus the usual weirdness of the main menu being capped at 30fps luckily though you can uncap the game itself and play it at your max mhz

awesome game  pudgy highly recommends play in window mode and to do so follow instructions below    to set ghostbusters to run in windowed mode follow these steps  create the folder localappdataghostbusters run and exit ghostbusters so the settingsini file gets created in the localappdataghostbusterssettingsini file change runwindowed0 to runwindowed1 run ghostbusters again and set an appropriate resolution
